summary: Added comprehensive regression tests to verify that Todo.__repr__ correctly escapes newlines, carriage returns, and tabs. The existing implementation using !r format specifier already handles this correctly.

ruff_check.command: uv run ruff check tests/test_issue_2087_todo_repr.py src/flywheel/todo.py

ruff_format.command: uv run ruff format --check tests/test_issue_2087_todo_repr.py src/flywheel/todo.py

limitations: Issue appears to be a false positive - existing !r format specifier already handles escaping correctly
